sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>12</base_damage> <critical_rating>3</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>This grenade uses gas similar to that found in blaster weapons, leading to an explosion with the damage and effect of a blaster rifle.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Plasma Grenade</name> <number>GEAR0001114</number> <price>125</price> <range>short</range> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-06 04:01:27</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9aa574312f5ca850e0f497eef699b6cc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-06 04:01:27</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
